name: Yeri Mua
description: '''Yeri Cruz Varela''' (born 17 December 2001), known professionally as '''Yeri Mua''', is a Mexican internet celebrity, singer, songwriter, and entrepreneur. She rose to popularity in 2018 for her live streams of makeup and cosmetics on [[Instagram]] and [[Facebook]]. In 2023, she embarked on a career as a reggaeton singer, notable for singles such as "[[Chupón]]" and "Línea del perreo."
